means: 毒品引起的，(吸毒后)兴奋的，狂喜的
(汽车发动机经改动后)功率增大的，马力更大的

sentence.Network_en: William hopped up and down to keep warm.
sentence.Network_cn: 威廉蹦蹦跳跳以暖和身体.

sentence.Network_en: She hopped up when she saw the scene.
sentence.Network_cn: 当她看到这样的景色时蹦蹦跳跳.

sentence.Network_en: These young characters who take dope go around all hopped up.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些吸毒的年轻家伙一个个都昏昏沉沉地到处走动.

list.abs: The frog hopped up and down , and nearly overturned the boat ., 它跳上跳下 , 几乎要把船弄翻.
hops 啤酒花hopped up 兴奋增压hopping 跳来跳去
带up的词组... ... hook up 用钩子钩住;引…上钩 hop up 给服用麻醉品,麻醉,使兴奋 jazz up 使巨有爵士乐情调;使活跃,使愉快,刺激.

people say he cheats in race by hopping up his engine .据说他在赛车时偷换大功率发动机作弊。
汽车专业英语词汇(2) ... 台架试验 bench test 强化试验 hop-up test 发动机试验台 engine test bed.

means.word_mean: 1. (of an automobile) having the engine modified to give extra power;
